**VPS**

\-----------------------  
**>> StorageVPS (OpenVZ)**  
\-----------------------  

OpenVZ & ZFS-backed Storage VPS, NVMe SSD-cached storage. [See some performance tests here](https://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/comment/1561922/#Comment_1561922).

**Storage500**  
500GB NVMe SSD-cached Storage  
2TB Bandwidth (gigabit port)  
1 Core  
512MB Ram  
1 IPv4 Address  
/64 IPv6 Subnet (on request)  
Virtualizor Control Panel  
OpenVZ Virtualisation  

**$21/Quarter**  
**Order Here**: [https://cc.delimiter.com/cart/storagevps/](https://cc.delimiter.com/cart/storagevps/?woo_campaign=let022916&woo_source=LET&woo_medium=web&woo_content=storage500)

(Expires Today: Double Disk Space promo on annual orders using coupon DoubleStorageVPS)

\---------------------  
**>> Cloud VPS (KVM)**  
\---------------------  

Redundant compute/storage/network. Based on CloudStack. NVMe-acclerated redundant Ceph storage. Private networking, router/firewall & load balancer included.

Compute nodes connected at: 10GigE - Public Network, 10GigE - Private Network, 40GigE - Storage.

1 CPU  
1GB Ram  
250GB Storage  
1TB Bandwidth (gigabit port)  
1 IPv4 Address  
Private Router/Firewall + Load Balancer  
KVM Virtualisation  

Order additional resources (CPU/Ram/Storage/IPs) & create multiple VMs, 1 CPU required per VM.  

**$6/Month**  
**Order Here**: [https://cc.delimiter.com/cart/cloud-resource-pool/](https://cc.delimiter.com/cart/cloud-resource-pool/?woo_campaign=let022916&woo_source=LET&woo_medium=web&woo_content=storage500)

--------------------

**Details**

**Locations**  
All services listed above are provided out of our Atlanta, GA datacentre. For updates regarding new locations, be sure to [join our Flash Sales email list](http://offers.delimiter.com/flashsales/?woo_campaign=let022916&woo_source=LET&woo_medium=web&woo_content=flashsales).

**Test IP/Files?**  
Send me a PM or email sales@delimiter.com. Provide IPs in your request if you'd like a traceroute from Atlanta.

**Delivery Times?**  
Each order is manually reviewed (be sure to use correct info, no VPN, etc). Order reviews take up to 1 business day, delivery within 1-2 business days after review. Current avg: 1.25 business days.

**Questions?**  
PM or email sales@delimiter.com
